CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1967, pg. 13 reads: "Special Table - Canon Junius Carter (fourth from right) and his wife had a special table at the Holy Cross Dinner-Dance. Pictured from left, the Rev. and Mrs. Charles Foggie, the Rev. LeRoy Patrick, Mrs. Junius Carter, Canon Carter, rector of Holy Cross; Father and Mrs. Kenneth Forrester of Tabamo, West Indies, and Miss Amril Crichlow of Washington D.C., Mr. and Mrs. Tom McGarrity are in the foreground."
TitMainTitle: Group at table, from left: Rev. Charles Foggie, Madeline Foggie, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, Mrs. Carter, Canon Junius Carter, Father Kenneth Forrester, Mrs. Forrester, Amril Crichlow, Tom McGarrity, and Julia Gaines McGarrity, with table in background including Ralph Barnett, Ann Barnett, James Dougan, Helen Sharpe Dougan, Morris Fountain, and Miriam Fountain, in ballroom of Hotel Webster Hall for Holy Cross Episcopal Church's 50th Anniversary Dinner-Dance
